thread.title: Ubisoft offers Might & Magic Heroes VII refunds after shipping disc-less Collector’s Edition

title: Ubisoft offers Might & Magic Heroes VII refunds after shipping disc-less Collector’s Edition
text:
Ubisoft offers Might & Magic Heroes VII refunds after shipping disc-less Collector’s Edition 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Ubisoft is offering refunds for players who purchased the North American Collector's Edition of Might & Magic Heroes VII, following the rece...
